questions.question: What is the purpose of version control systems?
answers: A. To track changes in software development

What is the output of 2 + 2 * 3?
What does HTML stand for?
answers: D. Hyperlinks and Text Markup Language

answers: A. To create a new branch

answers: A. To repeat a block of code a specific number of times
B. To execute code based on a condition

questions.question: What is the purpose of a 'try...catch' block in programming?
answers: D. To repeat a block of code

answers: C. To lead daily standup meetings
D. To prioritize and manage the product backlog

questions.question: What is a 'stack overflow' error?
answers: A. When a program runs out of memory
B. When a function calls itself indefinitely
C. When a program terminates unexpectedly

answers: A. Installs a new Node.js module

answers: C. To facilitate the Scrum process

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'SELECT' statement in SQL?
answers: A. To insert data into a table
B. To delete data from a table
C. To retrieve data from a table
D. To update data in a table

answers: C. To always execute code regardless of exceptions
D. To repeat a block of code

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a Git workflow?
What is the purpose of the 'virtualenv' tool in Python?
answers: D. To create isolated Python environments

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'map' function in Python?
answers: A. To apply a function to all elements of an iterable
B. To filter elements of an iterable
C. To sort elements of an iterable
D. To remove duplicates from an iterable

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'npm install' command in Node.js?
answers: A. Installs a new Node.js module
C. Updates Node.js to the latest version

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'git push' command?
answers: A. To upload changes to a remote repository
B. To create a new branch
C. To download changes from a remote repository

questions.question: What is the purpose of a 'docker container'?
answers: B. To package and distribute applications

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'else' statement in programming?
answers: A. To execute code based on a condition
C. To repeat a block of code

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'git merge' command?
answers: A. To create a new branch
C. To combine changes from different branches

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'git pull' command?
answers: A. To upload changes to a remote repository
B. To create a new branch
C. To download changes from a remote repository

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'npm start' command in Node.js?
answers: A. Starts a new Node.js project

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'npm uninstall' command in Node.js?
answers: A. Installs a new Node.js module
C. Updates Node.js to the latest version

questions.question: What does the 'git init' command do?
answers: A. Initializes a new Git repository
C. Initializes a new remote repository

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'git checkout' command?
answers: A. To create a new branch
B. To switch branches or restore working tree files
C. To combine changes from different branches
